vsParam:
Anis! I've prepared the item you asked for.
Here you are!

Wow... Thank you so very!
This flower should be able to bounce back!

Add the "Round Feces" into the soil...
And then water the flower...

Wow, so impressive!
Look, it blooms!
It's wonderful to see the flower flourishing again

Thank you so much!
You really are a big help!

Ha ha, stop acting cool.
Just take the compliment and be more excited.

Hehe, thank you so much,
[px]. You really are a big help!
I am going to hand in the investigation record to Ru Sensei, [px], you guys should come with me.

And I want to tell Ru Sensei the truth that I couldn't
have managed this assignment without the help from
[px] and Peppermint...

Well...
I'll give you a pass if I only look at the report itself.
This assignment is deliberately making things difficult.

Ha ha, don't get upset.
I also have my own concerns.

I am sorry, Anis.
This assignment was meant to challenge you.

I purposely gave you a malnourished plant.
All I wanted to see is how you would handle the assignment.
Gee, so this assignment was actually a test for Anis?

You are brilliant, and you stand out among all the
apprentice sages I've instructed and supervised.

Nevertheless, you will sooner or later encounter difficulties.
This is very common for a sage who studies the unknown.

I designed this assignment to see...
how you would react when you run into such a problem.

Waah...
Ru Sensei, you are tricky...

Humph, I am just doing what a teacher should do,
it doesn't mean I am a bad person.

Hehe, thank you, Ru Sensei.
Now I know... the purpose of this assignment.

Ok. Now please excuse me,
I have to get back to continue my research.

Hmm, I couldn't follow this complicated story...
Anyway, this assignment is completed, right?

You are right...
I couldn't have done it without [px] and Peppermint.

However, my research on plant habits is not over,
and I couldn't see the true meaning of this assignment earlier.

I will hand in the perfect work to my teacher next time!
And I must work harder to achieve my goal!

Ah, ah ha ha... that's Anis...
Being diligent in study is good, but don't harm your health.
